source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_SEQ_00<tab>Venat has a new course of investigation in mind.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_SEQ_00<tab>Venat has a new course of investigation in mind.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_TODO_00<tab>Survey the area from the vantage point.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_TODO_00<tab>Survey the area from the vantage point.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_000<tab>I should like to visit the site from which Hermes sent forth the Meteia. If we are fortunate, we might find some hint of what drives this research of his.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_000<tab>I should like to visit the site from which Hermes sent forth the Meteia. If we are fortunate, we might find some hint of what drives this research of his.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_001<tab>Galene said she spotted them in the southeast, rising from an isle she could see from the edge.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_001<tab>Galene said she spotted them in the southeast, rising from an isle she could see from the edge.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_002<tab>If we stand at that same vantage point, it should not prove too difficult to locate the isle in question. Let's take a look, shall we?
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_002<tab>If we stand at that same vantage point, it should not prove too difficult to locate the isle in question. Let's take a look, shall we?

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_010<tab>Now, if I were conducting some mystery research, where would I go...?
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_010<tab>Now, if I were conducting some mystery research, where would I go...?

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_012<tab>Have you the means to fly? 'Tis quite a distance away.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_012<tab>Have you the means to fly? 'Tis quite a distance away.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_013<tab>Hm. Inconvenient, but hardly an insurmountable problem.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_013<tab>Hm. Inconvenient, but hardly an insurmountable problem.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_015<tab>My friend, would you mind creating a double to carry <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here over to that island?
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_015<tab>My friend, would you mind creating a double to carry <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here over to that island?

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_017<tab>Stubborn creature. There is no place on this great star we have not together traveled, and still he remains obstinate in the presence of strangers.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_017<tab>Stubborn creature. There is no place on this great star we have not together traveled, and still he remains obstinate in the presence of strangers.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_018<tab>Argos has rather exacting standards, I'm afraid.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_018<tab>Argos has rather exacting standards, I'm afraid.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_019<tab>What? You've ridden him before...? Ah─your “before” meaning my “after.” Not at all confusing, that.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_019<tab>What? You've ridden him before...? Ah─your “before” meaning my “after.” Not at all confusing, that.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_021<tab>But speaking of the here and now, the quick solution is for us to face off in a sparring match.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_021<tab>But speaking of the here and now, the quick solution is for us to face off in a sparring match.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_022<tab>Demonstrate to him that you are capable of holding your own against me in battle, and you should convince Argos that you are worthy of his back.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_022<tab>Demonstrate to him that you are capable of holding your own against me in battle, and you should convince Argos that you are worthy of his back.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_023<tab>And besides, I might even teach you a thing or two into the bargain.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_023<tab>And besides, I might even teach you a thing or two into the bargain.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_024<tab>You seem doubtful. But useful lesson or not, it will certainly be a moment to remember─a memory of the distant past to cherish!
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_024<tab>You seem doubtful. But useful lesson or not, it will certainly be a moment to remember─a memory of the distant past to cherish!

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_025<tab>What say you, traveler out of time?
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_025<tab>What say you, traveler out of time?

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_A1_000_028<tab>I will do what I must.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_A1_000_028<tab>I will do what I must.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_A1_000_029<tab>And if this memory turns out to be a bad one...?
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_A1_000_029<tab>And if this memory turns out to be a bad one...?

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_031<tab>I had a feeling you might say something like that. Know that you “must” give a good showing, however!
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_031<tab>I had a feeling you might say something like that. Know that you “must” give a good showing, however!

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_032<tab>That's up to you, isn't it? If a loss would sting, then you had better win!
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_032<tab>That's up to you, isn't it? If a loss would sting, then you had better win!

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_033<tab>Clear your mind and prepare your weapons. I will await you at the clearing over yonder.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_033<tab>Clear your mind and prepare your weapons. I will await you at the clearing over yonder.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>The entity is identical to the one you encountered in Mare Lamentorum...except <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> Argos is pointedly ignoring you.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>The entity is identical to the one you encountered in Mare Lamentorum...except <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> Argos is pointedly ignoring you.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_050<tab>Shall we begin? Be warned: I'll not go easy on you!
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_050<tab>Shall we begin? Be warned: I'll not go easy on you!

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>You must be a Disciple of War or Magic of level 87 or above to proceed.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>You must be a Disciple of War or Magic of level 87 or above to proceed.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_060<tab>Argos will soon have us standing on the very spot where the Meteia made their departure into the night sky. With luck, we will learn something of Hermes's intentions.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_060<tab>Argos will soon have us standing on the very spot where the Meteia made their departure into the night sky. With luck, we will learn something of Hermes's intentions.

source: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_061<tab>My hope is that we find no connection─no festering wish for oblivion. Then we might have Hermes and his considerable expertise working for us, rather than against us.
target: TEXT_AKTKME114_04432_VENAS_000_061<tab>My hope is that we find no connection─no festering wish for oblivion. Then we might have Hermes and his considerable expertise working for us, rather than against us.
